name: @porsche-design-system/react
author: Dr. Ing. h.c. F. Porsche AG

scripts.build: yarn clean:build && yarn build:wrappers && yarn build:jsdom-polyfill && yarn build:uxpin && yarn build:meta
scripts.build:meta: SOURCE=./projects/components-wrapper TARGET=./dist/components-wrapper && mkdir -p $TARGET && cp $SOURCE/package.json $TARGET && cp $SOURCE/README.md $TARGET && cp $SOURCE/LICENSE $TARGET && cp ../components/CHANGELOG.md $TARGET
scripts.test: yarn test:jsdom-polyfill && yarn test:unit && yarn test:e2e && yarn test:vrt && yarn test:cbt
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'server,e2e' 'BROWSER=none yarn start' 'wait-on -t 240000 http-get://localhost:3000 && ts-node --project tests/e2e/config/tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/jasmine --config=tests/e2e/config/jasmine.config.json'
scripts.test:vrt: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'server,vrt' 'BROWSER=none yarn start' 'wait-on -t 240000 http-get://localhost:3000 && ts-node --project tests/vrt/config/tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/jasmine --config=tests/vrt/config/jasmine.config.json'
scripts.test:cbt: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'server,cbt' 'BROWSER=none yarn start' 'wait-on -t 240000 http-get://localhost:3000 && ts-node --project tests/cbt/config/tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/jasmine --config=tests/cbt/config/jasmine.config.json'
